ItemDesc: When used, increase SPD of all allies by 8%, and Effect Hit Rate by <unbreak>20%</unbreak> for the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: Adding water to coffee powder gets you coffee. Adding water to the mixture of Stone of The Hunt and Interdimensional Leaf plus a touch of virtual particle gives you Ruby Potion!\n\n"Ruby Potion gets you addictive to thinking fast, not to the potion itself!"
